sentences.en: Already, one or two critics have begun to muddle the two names.
sentences.cn: 一两个评论家已经开始把这两个名字弄混了。

sentences.en: Don't work in a rush and get into a muddle.
sentences.cn: 克服忙乱现象.

sentences.en: Everything in the room was in a muddle.
sentences.cn: 房间里每一件东西都是乱七八糟的.

sentences.en: I'll muddle through somehow.
sentences.cn: 我会设法应付过去的.

sentences.en: I've arranged the books alphabetically so don't muddle them up.
sentences.cn: 我已按字母顺序把这些书整理了,千万不要再弄乱.

sentences.en: If everyone acts as he pleases, everything will be in a muddle.
sentences.cn: 要是各行其是, 那就乱套了.

sentences.en: Never just muddle through your work.
sentences.cn: 决不能苟且行事.

sentences.en: Our accountant finally managed to sort out the muddle.
sentences.cn: 我们的会计终于把混乱的账目理清了。

sentences.en: Someone’s muddled up all the papers on my desk.
sentences.cn: 有人把我桌上的文件全都弄乱了。

sentences.en: Spanish and Italian are very similar and I sometimes get them muddled up .
sentences.cn: 西班牙语和意大利语很相似，我有时会把它们弄混。

sentences.en: students are often left to muddle along.
sentences.cn: 学生们经常被丢在一边自己应付。

sentences.en: The BBC may be able to muddle through the next five years like this.
sentences.cn: 像这样，英国广播公司也许能勉强再应付5年。

sentences.en: The best we can do is try to stay cool and muddle through.
sentences.cn: 我们能做的顶多就是设法保持冷静，蒙混过关。

sentences.en: The government seems to have lost its way and muddled its priorities.
sentences.cn: 政府似乎迷失了方向，分不清轻重缓急。

sentences.en: The laws led to confusion, muddle and years of delay.
sentences.cn: 这些法律导致了困惑、混乱和数年的耽搁。

sentences.en: The papers are all in a muddle.
sentences.cn: 文件全都乱七八糟的.

sentences.en: The twins are so alike that it’s easy to muddle them up.
sentences.cn: 这对双胞胎看上去太像了，很容易弄混。

sentences.en: the words seemed to have &B{got muddled up}.
sentences.cn: 这些词似乎被混淆了。

sentences.en: We are beginning to muddle the extended royal family and the monarchy.
sentences.cn: 我们开始混淆皇室大家庭和君主制这两个概念了。

sentences.en: We muddle along from day to day.
sentences.cn: 我们一天天地混日子.

sentences.en: We will muddle through and just play it day by day.
sentences.cn: 我们会应付过关的，就一天一天地演吧。

sentences.en: You are currently in a muddle where financial and emotional concerns are tangled together.
sentences.cn: 你眼下头脑不清了，对于金钱和感情的忧虑交织在了一起。

words.tran_cn: 糊涂的；混乱的；头脑昏昏然的
使污浊；使沾上泥；把…弄糊涂

phrases.tran_cn: 差强人意地应付，设法应付
胡乱应付过去：以毫无组织的方式应付过去而得到一个还不错的结果

trans.tran_en: when there is confusion about something, and things are done wrong as a result

trans.tran_cn: 混合, 使微醉, 使咬字不清晰, 鬼混
trans.tran_en: to confuse one person or thing with another, and make a mistake

trans.tran_cn: 弄乱，弄糟，使糊涂，使微醉，使咬字不清晰
trans.tran_en: to put things in the wrong order
to put things in the wrong order
